content:
Over the past 24 hours, the enemy has made 8 storms in the Orikhiv direction, of which 6 were in the area of the robot, 1 - in the areas of small Tokmachka and Staromayorsk. Having suffered losses, he went to his starting positions.

About thisreportDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

At the same time, on the Left Bank of the Dnieper, the enemy did not dare to storm our positions.

The Defense Forces added that in the operational zone, the enemy does not stop the pressure both with artillery shelling and the use of aviation, attack drones of various types, and also conducts reconnaissance using unmanned spies.

As reported by the Armyinform, during the last day at the fronthappened74 combat clashes.
title: In the Orikhiv direction the enemy was storming the positions of the Armed Forces 8 times
description: This was reported by the defense forces of southern Ukraine. At the same time on the Left Bank of the Dnieper the enemy ...
author: Army Inform
